languages.text: "Я приказываю тебе убрать оружие, пока ты никого не прикончил".
"I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."
languages.original_text: "Я приказываю тебе убрать оружие, пока ты никого не прикончил".

traits.locale_text: "I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."
"I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."
"I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."
"I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."
"I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."

languages.text: « Je vous ordonne de ranger votre arme avant de tuer quelqu'un. »
languages.original_text: "I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ordonne de ranger votre arme avant de tuer quelqu'un. »

languages.text: 「誰かを殺してしまう前に、武器をしまえと命令しているんだ」
languages.original_text: "I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."

traits.locale_text: 「誰かを殺してしまう前に、武器をしまえと命令しているんだ」

languages.text: «Le ordeno que guarde el arma antes de que mate a nadie».
languages.original_text: "I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."

traits.locale_text: «Le ordeno que guarde el arma antes de que mate a nadie».

languages.text: “我命令你把武器收起来，否则你可能会害死别人。”
languages.original_text: "I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."

traits.locale_text: “我命令你把武器收起来，否则你可能会害死别人。”

languages.original_text: "I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."

languages.text: "Ich befehle Euch, Eure Waffe wegzulegen, bevor Ihr jemanden tötet."
languages.original_text: "I am ordering you to put your weapon away before you kill someone."

traits.locale_text: "Ich befehle Euch, Eure Waffe wegzulegen, bevor Ihr jemanden tötet."
